name: Table Builder
description:
Table Builder 2.0 is out now! It has all the great features of Table Builder but now uses interactive states, variants, and much, much more. Check it out here! https://www.figma.com/community/file/954180095640907124/Table-Builder-2.0


Auto-layout is a powerful feature. This allows you to build and customize table designs using both horizontal and vertical layout.


Make sure to read the instructions before using them. Being familiar with the following plugins will also be helpful in making the most out of this builder and creating multiple types of tables:

- Smart Cloner

- Similayer

- Reattach Instance


Enjoy and feel free to reach out with questions on Twitter @DimitriOtero
